name: Bacteria-X: Adventure
description:
*** At MGP, we are currently working hard on developing Bacteria-X's sequel: Cellz! You can follow it's developement by watching these videos (in French only) or simply follow it on facebook! It helps a lot!

Don't miss the next invasion :3 ***

Take place in the greatest human invasion ever made! Play as a germ which evolves in the deep world of a human organism and tries to survive while the immune system takes a defense position!
